message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Quietly constructive session for mid/small caps. PSU rails/infrastructure and select financials showed relative strength (RVNL, ABCAPITAL, LTF), while exchanges/depositories diverged (BSE bounced, CDSL weak close). Our holdings: GMRAIRPORT coiled under 106, BHEL firmed toward resistance, BSE reclaimed intraday lows but still below 2860, CDSL closed near day’s low. Plan is to act Monday on breakouts; only protective stops if tomorrow turns risk-off.",
  "top_signals": [
    {"symbol": "RVNL", "signal": "Breakout buy on strength", "reason": "Strong close near highs; momentum continuation above 326–330 opens 338/345. Risk reference ~311.", "price": 322.90},
    {"symbol": "NBCC", "signal": "Retest-buy / add on strength", "reason": "Held breakout zone; buy >118.5–119 or dips to 114–115 with tight stop ~111.5.", "price": 117.59},
    {"symbol": "ABCAPITAL", "signal": "Continuation buy", "reason": "Closed near HOD; sustained >346.8/350 can extend. Risk marker ~332.", "price": 345.45},
    {"symbol": "INDUSTOWER", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Coiling base; sustained move >415 with volume can start next leg. Risk ~392.", "price": 403.60},
    {"symbol": "LTF", "signal": "Add on breakout", "reason": "Tight consolidation; trigger above 301.5–302. Risk ~291.", "price": 296.90},
    {"symbol": "HUDCO", "signal": "Buy-the-dip", "reason": "Strong trend; buy near 226–228 with stop ~221; add through 235 on strength.", "price": 230.76},
    {"symbol": "IDBI", "signal": "Two-sided plan", "reason": "Accumulate on dips 98–100 with stop ~96, or buy strength only above 105.", "price": 101.20},
    {"symbol": "HINDCOPPER", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Tight range near highs; >324 can target 335–340. Risk ~312.", "price": 320.20},
    {"symbol": "GMRAIRPORT", "signal": "Hold; add only on breakout", "reason": "High-volume base intact; trigger >105.5–106. Risk reference ~101.9.", "price": 104.21},
    {"symbol": "BHEL", "signal": "Hold; add on strength", "reason": "Trend resumes on push above 287–292. Risk marker ~276–277.", "price": 282.90},
    {"symbol": "CDSL", "signal": "Manage risk; strength-only", "reason": "Closed near day’s low; stability on reclaim >1605; momentum >1665–1670. Cut if <1570.", "price": 1574.10},
    {"symbol": "SJVN", "signal": "Range trade; strength-only", "reason": "Range 78–80; buy only on breakout >80 with stop ~77.", "price": 77.88}
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [
    {"symbol": "GMRAIRPORT", "action": "Sell", "reason": "Break of base would signal downside momentum; protect capital.", "quantity": 25, "price": "SL-M 101.90"},
    {"symbol": "BHEL", "action": "Sell", "reason": "Loss of key support invalidates near-term setup.", "quantity": 10, "price": "SL-M 274.80"},
    {"symbol": "BSE", "action": "Sell", "reason": "Structure weakens below key swing; avoid deeper drawdown.", "quantity": 1, "price": "SL-M 2768.00"},
    {"symbol": "CDSL", "action": "Sell", "reason": "Close to support; breakdown would accelerate weakness.", "quantity": 1, "price": "SL-M 1568.00"}
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 17418.05,
    "total_value": 27267.00,
    "holdings_count": 4,
    "holdings": [
      "GMRAIRPORT: 25 units @ 104.05 (CMP 104.21)",
      "BHEL: 10 units @ 281.30 (CMP 282.90)",
      "BSE: 1 unit @ 2858.63 (CMP 2840.60)",
      "CDSL: 1 unit @ 1610.20 (CMP 1574.10)"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "PSU rails/infrastructure: RVNL strong near HOD; continuation above 326–330. IRCON constructive; watch >165 for momentum.",
    "Exchanges/Depositories: BSE bid back from 2795 but needs >2860/2879 to improve. CDSL heavy; stability only on >1605; momentum >1665.",
    "NBFCs/Banks: LTF coiling under 302; clean trigger >302. PSU banks (IDBI/IOB/CENTRALBK) consolidating—prefer dip-buys with defined stops or breakouts (IDBI >105).",
    "Capital goods/cables: BHEL needs >287–292; BEL needs >414–418 then >432. KEI/Polycab in tight flags—strength-only entries.",
    "Metals: HINDCOPPER near resistance; watch >324. SAIL subdued; avoid until >145.2.",
    "Renewables/Power: NTPCGREEN range 93.7–95.3; watch >95.5. InoxWind choppy; strength-only with tight risk.",
    "Pharma: LUPIN firm; Biocon soft, needs >405 to reassert. Zydus steady; Alkem firm.",
    "IT: MPHASIS and COFORGE constructive; prefer breakouts with small sizing given volatility.",
    "Discretionary/FMCG: Voltas steady in 1345–1365 band; Trent and Jubilant Food range-bound—wait for decisive breaks.",
    "Execution for Monday: If gap >0.7%, let first 20–30 minutes set range; favor pullback entries to marked levels with predefined stops and small sizes."
  ]
}
